siteMetadata.title: Ranjeet Harishchandre | Frontend Developer
siteMetadata.description: Professional portfolio of Ranjeet Harishchandre, Frontend Developer with expertise in React, TypeScript, Next.js, and more.
siteMetadata.author: Ranjeet Harishchandre

about.sectionSubtitle: Get to know me better: my background, skills, and what drives me as a developer.
about.bioDescription: As a professional Frontend Developer with around 4.5+ years of experience, I possess expertise in React, TypeScript, Next.js, SCSS, Tailwind CSS, and more. Throughout my career, I've contributed to over 30 web projects, catering to a diverse range of clients from finance to e-commerce.
about.bioDescription2: Additionally, I've worked on DeFi projects and cryptocurrency trading platforms, expanding my knowledge in these domains. Passionate about web technologies, I adopt a continuous learning approach to enhance my skills. Currently, I'm immersing myself in Flutter and Dart, with future aspirations to delve into Blockchain Development.

philosophies.title: User-Centered Design
philosophies.description: I believe in creating digital experiences that prioritize user needs and preferences, ensuring intuitive and accessible interfaces for all.

philosophies.title: Clean Code Architecture
philosophies.description: I'm passionate about writing maintainable, efficient code with clear patterns and structure that makes collaboration and future development easier.

philosophies.title: Continuous Learning
philosophies.description: Technology evolves rapidly, and I'm committed to staying current with the latest tools, frameworks, and best practices in frontend development.

skills.sectionSubtitle: What I bring to the table

jobs.description: Building reusable components and developing web applications with cutting-edge features utilized by thousands of users in their daily routines.
achievements: Redesigned application form used by more than 1 million people weekly, implementing React by injecting it inside webpages to significantly increase site speed
Implemented OpenAI and Bard APIs to automate text writing and added speech-to-action feature for voice command functionality
Successfully upgraded frontend libraries in a large-scale project, maintaining 100% uptime and zero production bugs, receiving recognition from CTO
Integrated RF-GPT into SaaS product to help recruiters automate tasks like email writing, job description creation, and call logs, enhancing workflow efficiency

jobs.description: Worked on DeFi cryptocurrency web applications using modern frontend technologies.
achievements: Built InvestDex, a DeFi web application using React with custom Next.js and Chakra UI in a team environment
Independently developed Trifle Finance, an in-house cryptocurrency exchange and DeFi application using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
Created the frontend for Gimble Pay, a payment integration web application using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
Converted SPSQ, a crypto trading platform from jQuery to an Electron React application for Windows, macOS, and Linux

jobs.description: Worked on an enterprise application providing pre-developed web app templates without coding requirements.
achievements: Gained valuable insights into professional web development practices and industry standards
Developed components for enterprise application focused on template-based web development
Applied React best practices in a real-world application development environment

jobs.description: Worked as a freelancer on React web applications for various clients.
achievements: Developed PVP College site, a fully responsive website using Next.js, Tailwind, and JavaScript
Managed entire web development lifecycle from requirement gathering to deployment
Created custom solutions for varied client needs across different business domains

items.title: Mauli CSP
items.description: Customer Support Portal SaaS software for small and medium-sized shops
items.longDescription: Built the Customer Support Portal as SaaS software focused on small and medium-sized shops. The platform allows shopkeepers to add entries for new products, track sales, and monitor borrowings. The main focus was to provide easy access to statistics on inventory and sales. Solo developed both backend and frontend for this project.
highlights: Full-stack development from concept to deployment
Scalable architecture for seamless feature additions
User-friendly UI for non-technical shop owners

items.title: PVP College Site
items.description: Fully responsive college website with modern UI/UX
items.longDescription: Developed PVP College site as a freelance project. It's a fully responsive website built using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, providing an intuitive and engaging experience for students, faculty, and visitors.
highlights: Fast loading times with Next.js optimization

items.title: InvestDex
items.description: DeFi web application for cryptocurrency investment and trading
items.longDescription: Collaborated on InvestDex, a DeFi web application built in React with custom Next.js and Chakra UI. The platform enables users to invest, trade, and manage their cryptocurrency portfolio with advanced DeFi features.

items.title: Trifle Finance
items.description: In-house cryptocurrency exchange and DeFi application
items.longDescription: Independently developed Trifle Finance, an in-house cryptocurrency exchange and DeFi application. Built using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, the platform provides a seamless trading experience with advanced DeFi features.

degrees.institution: P.V.P COLLEGE LONI, University of PUNE
degrees.description: Master's degree in Computer Science with focus on software development and web technologies
achievements: Specialized in web development technologies
Completed thesis on modern frontend frameworks

degrees.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science covering fundamental and advanced computing concepts
achievements: Score: 62.00%
Focused on programming and development
Participated in various technical events and workshops

items.name: Recruiterflow Team
items.testimonial: Ranjeet received praise from our CTO for his exceptional work in upgrading the frontend libraries while maintaining 100% uptime and zero production bugs.

items.name: Stackera Project Lead
items.testimonial: Ranjeet independently developed Trifle Finance, demonstrating excellent skills in Next.js and TypeScript. His ability to handle complex DeFi applications was impressive.

items.name: PVP College
items.testimonial: The website Ranjeet developed for us is fully responsive and meets all our requirements. His work exceeded our expectations in terms of design and functionality.
